definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: All kinds of protective device make sure tranverse mobile platform safe running .
sentences.chinese: 多种安全保护装置保证移车平台安全运行。

sentences.english: The iPATH Telemedicine Platform is an open-source software.
sentences.chinese: iPATH远程医疗平台是一种开源软件。

sentences.english: This platform can be pulled up when deciding to go for a swim.
sentences.chinese: 这个平台在决定去游泳时还可以收缩起来。

sentences.english: Keep in mind that Drone Platforms don't supply Assimilators when sold.
sentences.chinese: 时刻记得机械平台在卖掉得时候不提供同化者。

sentences.english: Lysithea system is an Enterprise Application System based on J2EE Platform.
sentences.chinese: 该系统是一个基于J2EE平台的企业级应用。

sentences.english: She brought up the water, stopping at each landing to get her breath.
sentences.chinese: 她提水上楼，在每个楼梯平台处停下来喘口气。

sentences.english: The hall was built on a high terrace, and has 21 rooms.
sentences.chinese: 大厅既建立在一个高的平台，并有21间。

sentences.english: The developer claims that this game has been a top-seller on wireless and on retail platforms.
sentences.chinese: 开发商声称，这场比赛已顶级无线和卖方的零售平台。

sentences.english: Unity is a very convenient tool for multi-platform game development.
sentences.chinese: Unity是一款非常方便的跨平台游戏开发工具。

sentences.english: We see this platform as winning.
sentences.chinese: 我们把这个平台视作一种胜利。

sentences.english: Mooring positioning system is one of the key technologies of the semi-submersible drilling platform.
sentences.chinese: 锚泊定位系统是半潜式平台关键技术之一。

sentences.english: A perfect platform for educating new team members about what the solution entails.
sentences.chinese: 对新团队成员进行有关解决方案需求教育的完美平台。

sentences.english: There, you have compatibility across the board.
sentences.chinese: 因为它拥有跨平台的兼容性。

sentences.english: Of course, she adds, there are hundreds of rigs out there.
sentences.chinese: 当然，她补充道，有数百个钻井平台在那里的。

sentences.english: Inspite of a small set of challenges, cloud provides a powerful platform for testing.
sentences.chinese: 尽管有一些问题，云提供了测试的强大平台。

sentences.english: A hardware-in-the-loop test bench was developed and was applied in debugging the algorithms that had been mentioned previously.
sentences.chinese: 应用自制的硬件在环试验平台对上述算法进行了调试。
